name: KOCO
description:
Are you ready to take your taste buds on a thrilling adventure? Step into the world of dim sum, where you'll become the tiniest yet most ambitious chef in town!

Bounce, leap, and somersault your way through an array of delectable, larger-than-life dim sum dishes, from fluffy pork buns to savory dumplings and everything in between. Can you conquer the culinary kingdom, one jump at a time?



KOCO, where you'll meet a tasty lineup of classic Yue dim sum. From yummy shrimp dumplings to flavorful Shumai and soft steamed rice rolls, these treats are out to stop you in your tracks!

Gameplay


Here's the deal: the game is a piece of cake. Jump, dodge obstacles, and time it just right. Each level serves up different plates, each with its own quirks. And as you move forward, it gets tougher, mixing up the plates to keep you on your toes.

Sure, you might take a spill or two, but don't throw in the towel. Becoming a master chef is no cakewalk, but it's a deliciously fun ride!
